problem_text_cn: 如图,某数学兴趣小组将边长为6的正方形铁丝框ABCD变形为以A为圆心,AB为半径的扇形(忽略铁丝的粗细),则所得的扇形DAB的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a mathematical interest group deforms a square wire frame ABCD with a edge length of N_0 into a sector with A as the center and AB as the radius (ignoring the thickness of the wire), then the area of ​​the resulting sector DAB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵扇形ABD的弧长DB等于正方形两边长的和BC+DC=12,扇形ABD的半径为正方形的边长6;∴S扇形ABD=\frac{1}{2}×12×6=36.故选D.
